newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,687 to dollar for Dec 12 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,687 to dollar for Dec 12 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate weaker at 3,687 to the dollar for December 12.
This reference rate was set on Tuesday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Monday for December 11 is 3,616 to the dollar. It was 3,618 on Tuesday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
